fields_of_interest: Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication, Fraud prevention
eu_initiatives: Mobileum follows regulatory changes related to Digital Single Market, Roaming Regulation, Net Neutrality, GPDR, ePrivacy, IoT, security, eCall, etc.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Mobileum helps CSPs leverage the power of analytics and big data to deliver monetizable insights that drive business transformation at 650 customers. Mobileum's Wisdom-Action platform powers solutions across domains such as voice and data roaming, IoT/M2M, video, Travel, Counter fraud, Data abuse, and CEM. Mobileum is based in California's Silicon Valley, with offices across the globe. http://www.mobileum.com
